meanings.sent2: The sun will indubitably rise tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: His love for pizza is indubitably strong.
meanings.sent4: The impact of her words was indubitably profound.
meanings.sent5: The indubitably clear sky was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: The magician indubitably amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The team will indubitably win the championship.
meanings.sent3: His dance moves were indubitably entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The bond between them was indubitably unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset was indubitably breathtaking.
